summary: Retex of Elven armor to a dark steel and gold. Male only at the moment.
descriptionHtml:
This armor was originally uploaded by \"kevinwastaken\" under the title \"Elven Armor retextured\". The version is \"Darker Texture\" 1.0b. Which is where I got the base file from and decided to try my hand at modding it to my own personal taste. I am still in the process of doing a complete overhaul of it, as I think the gold is still a little too yellow and I want to alter the steel color and add some more gold trim. Just wanted to share what I have done with it so far and hopefully get some opinions on it as it is the first thing I have attempted to mod.

Also, I would like to thank kevinwastaken for providing the original file. And for providing me with something else to sink the rather small amount of time into that I am not currently spending playing Skyrim.

Original can be found here: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=300



--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Installation: Copy the \"Armor\" or \"Weapons\" file into your \"skyrim > data > textures\" folder. Generally located inside of your \"Steam > steamapps > common\" folder. Then just make sure to restart your game and everything should work fine. 

Uninstall: Go to your \"skyrim > data > textures > armor\" folder and delete the folder titled \"Elven\".

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Edit: Added an updated version of 2.0. Changed the red sash to a more earthy tone to better fit the surrounding. Also added a new \"White Gold\" version of the chest piece. Hopefully you enjoy it.

Also, added the shield as a separate file.

Edit #2: Added a female version in silver and gold. Will add a male version shortly.
author: Vykun
